title: Battery info enquiry
content: hi. I just bought a new pixel phone (4XL). and I notice something weird about the battery. at the "last full charge" it said 42 days ago. I'm just curious, if it's a new phone and factory sealed, why does it have duration. shouldn't it be 0 days? please explain. thank you so much
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
